-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: none
-------name: # INCLUDE_BUILD
# INCLUDE_BUILD(./fixtures/replace1.txt)

-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: none
-------name: #include_build
#include_build(./fixtures/replace1.txt)

-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: none
-------name: #   include_build
#   include_build(./fixtures/replace1.txt)

-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: none
-------name: #		include_build
-------using tabs
#		include_build(./fixtures/replace1.txt)

-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [text?padleft=4&before=\n&after=\n,breakstring?width=90&flags=word]
-------name: # include_BUILD
"# include_BUILD(./fixtures/replace3.txt)[text?padleft=4&before=\n&after=\n,breakstring?width=90&flags=word]"
